main_definition: In simple English, 'Sie' is a formal pronoun in German used to address or refer to someone politely.

meanings_and_examples.example: When speaking to multiple people, you would use 'sie' as a respectful form of address.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Formal way to say 'you' in German when talking to someone not well acquainted or out of respect
meanings_and_examples.example: Hallo, Sie hier im Raum. Ich bin Ihr Fahrer für heute.
